DOC.brief_summary: This research study prospective , single-center , feasibility study design assess possibility detect hemodynamic change tachycardia episode use tissue perfusion .
DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Differentiation Tachycardia Episodes Using Tissue Perfusion
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct evaluate feasibility detect hemodynamic change induce supra-ventricular ventricular tachycardia ( SVT VT ) use tissue perfusion . Patients standard indication either electrophysiological study implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) implant include study . Tissue perfusion arterial blood pressure monitor record throughout electrophysiological procedure ICD implant testing . The study conduct two consecutive phase . After completion study phase I study phase II commence . Study phase I acute non-invasive study patient indication electrophysiological study , tissue perfusion measure non-invasively epi-cutaneous tissue perfusion sensor . Phase II acute invasive study patient indication implantation ICD , tissue perfusion sensor place surgically prepared device pocket muscular pectoralis muscular pectoralis major muscular pectoralis minor .
DOC.criteria: Indication : electrophysiological study ventricular stimulation OR implantation implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) Patient least 18 year old . Patient able willing give inform consent .
